articles.title: Two alleged militia members found guilty of plot to abduct Michigan governor - Reuters
articles.description: A jury on Tuesday convicted two men accused of conspiring to trigger "a second American revolution" by kidnapping Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer, handing the U.S. government a victory in its second attempt to prosecute the case.
articles.content: Aug 23 (Reuters) - A jury on Tuesday convicted two men accused of conspiring to trigger "a second American revolution" by kidnapping Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer, handing the U.S. government a … [+3623 chars]

articles.title: Calm Down, Rema's Big Hit Receives A Global Makeover - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Rema has enlisted the help of American pop star Selena Gomez for the remix of his Calm Down song in an effort to achieve international
articles.content: Rema’s song “Calm Down” shot to a hundred million views on YouTube in less than three months after it was released, making it an immediate hit. The track, made available as one of the songs before hi… [+670 chars]
